originalTitle: At least 55 Ghanaians killed in Russia-Ukraine war, minister says
title: At least 55 Ghanaians killed in Russia-Ukraine war, minister says
content: This is the highest number of confirmed casualties from a single African country in the Ukraine-Russia war.

originalTitle: Former US diplomat sentenced to life for abusing two girls in Burkina Faso
title: Former US diplomat sentenced to life for abusing two girls in Burkina Faso
content: He used the girls' mother's life-threatening illness as an opportunity to demand sex, said the US Office of Public Affairs.

originalTitle: Epstein tried to buy a palace in Morocco days before his arrest in 2019
title: Epstein tried to buy a palace in Morocco days before his arrest in 2019
content: The disgraced financier was in talks to buy luxury abode Bin Ennakhi - but the purchase was never completed.

originalTitle: Mapping US and Israeli attacks on Iran and Tehran’s retaliatory strikes
title: Mapping US and Israeli attacks on Iran and Tehran’s retaliatory strikes
content: The US and Israel launched an attack on Iran. Tehran has responded by launching missiles at Israel and Gulf states.

originalTitle: Backpacks, schoolbooks seen amid rubble of Iranian girls’ school
title: Backpacks, schoolbooks seen amid rubble of Iranian girls’ school
content: Rescuers dug through the rubble of a girls' elementary school in Minab, Iran after a US-Israeli strike.

originalTitle: The fantasy of an easy victory in the war on Iran
title: The fantasy of an easy victory in the war on Iran
content: The US and Israel declared regime change as their ultimate goal. That, however, would be difficult to achieve.

originalTitle: Inside Iran, panic as strikes hit but for some it's a moment of relief
title: Inside Iran, panic as strikes hit but for some it's a moment of relief
content: Iranians talk about what is happening inside the country, despite an almost total internet blackout.

originalTitle: Iran says it has hit US base in Bahrain, as it launches strikes across region
title: Iran says it has hit US base in Bahrain, as it launches strikes across region
content: Huge plumes of black smoke were seen rising from an area near the headquarters of the US Navy's Fifth Fleet in Manama, Bahrain.

originalTitle: At least 20 killed after military plane carrying banknotes crashes in Bolivia
title: At least 20 killed after military plane carrying banknotes crashes in Bolivia
content: Police fire tear gas to disperse crowds allegedly trying to take banknotes from the crash site.

originalTitle: More VAR challenge trials expected during two-year review
title: More VAR challenge trials expected during two-year review
content: Pierluigi Collina says there will be further trials of a challenge system as part of a two-year review of VAR.

originalTitle: The moment I told my mum I wanted to stop football - and how life changed
title: The moment I told my mum I wanted to stop football - and how life changed
content: England captain Leah Williamson tells presenter Kelly Somers about her journey in football - and life away from the game.

originalTitle: West Ham must sell players in summer after £104m loss
title: West Ham must sell players in summer after £104m loss
content: West Ham will need to sell players this summer even if they avoid relegation from the Premier League, after revealing a £104.2m loss for the last financial year.
